p: Still considering the anti-cancer activity, in 2018, Wan et al. [ 49] investigated, through a number of bioassays, the action mechanism of the anti-cancer effect of compound 127, being known that this compound demonstrates oxidant potential, being able to interrupt the cell cycle of cancer cell lines MCF-7, NCI-H460, and A375-C5 [ 87]. Nonetheless, it is not known if compound 127, as well as other limonoids, could cause autophagy and other cellular responses in carcinoma cells.
